This hentai comic was the reason why I created my account a couple of months ago. I finally have the chance to comment on this. There is a lot to unpack here. First of all she shouldn't have been dropping in uninvited just because they are neighbors and childhood friends. Second, she shouldn't have asked for him to get lost when she had her boyfriend over. If she is really that embarrassed she should go to her bf's place or get a hotel. The MC has no obligations to leave his own place because of what might happen next door. That being said, MC should have set boundaries. To be honest I think Akemi had a crush on Keita and she was hurt that he never saw her as a real woman. She eventually moved on but she still kept him as a friend. He finally saw her as a woman and felt betrayed because she never once acted feminine around him. Now I'm not saying the MC was right for what he did, I'm just saying I understand his frustration. This just seems like a case of miscommunication.
